segments.text: Oh , the ink is spilled on the desk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did it spill on your clothes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but the table cloth was dirty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid it's too hard to wash off the stain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really feel great shame . Let me buy a new one for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be silly , forget about it .
segments.speaker: S2
